pre_caption: From a top-down perspective, the video begins with a wide shot, centering a convoy on a road that runs horizontally across the middle of the frame. The desert landscape occupies the top and bottom of the frame, serving as the background. The camera maintains its position directly above the scene throughout the entire shot.
